title: Large Print Sudoku Masters: Volume 2
subtitle: Easy to Medium - Building Confidence
author: Igor Ganapolsky
description: Build your Sudoku confidence with 100 progressively challenging large print puzzles that bridge beginner and intermediate levels. This volume features a careful mix of easy and medium difficulty puzzles, all printed in extra-large 20-point font. Each puzzle is designed to gradually improve your solving skills while maintaining visual comfort. Includes advanced solving techniques, step-by-step examples, and solutions organized for easy reference.
categories: Health, Fitness & Dieting > Mental Health > Memory Improvement
Education & Teaching > Studying & Workbooks > Logic & Brain Teasers
target_audience: Seniors, intermediate solvers, cognitive development seekers

cover_design.dalle_prompt: Professional book cover for 'Large Print Sudoku Masters: Volume 2 - Easy to Medium'. Modern design with gradient from light blue (easy) to medium blue (medium difficulty). Feature Sudoku grid with progression visual. Bold, accessible typography with 'Volume 2' prominently displayed. Include progress bar or arrow showing skill advancement. Clean, professional layout with 'Building Confidence' subtitle. Add 'Large Print' badge.
cover_design.back_cover_dalle_prompt: Professional paperback back cover for Large Print Sudoku Masters Volume 2. Modern design with blue gradient theme. Highlight key features: '100 Progressive Puzzles', 'Easy to Medium Difficulty', 'Confidence Building Approach', 'Advanced Technique Tutorials'. Include brief description of skill progression, author credentials, and testimonial space. Barcode placement at bottom right. Professional typography matching front cover design.
